original_text: And Joshua said, Why hast thou troubled us? the Lord shall trouble thee this day. And all Israel stoned him with stones, and burned them with fire, after they had stoned them with stones.
korean_text: 여호수아가 이르되 네가 어찌하여 우리를 괴롭게 하였느냐 여호와께서 오늘 너를 괴롭게 하시리라 하니 온 이스라엘이 그를 돌로 치고 물건들도 돌로 치고 불사르고

sentences.original_text: the Lord shall trouble thee this day
And all Israel stoned him with stones
sentences.korean_translation: 온 이스라엘이 그를 돌로 쳐서 죽이고

sentences.original_text: after they had stoned them with stones
